com.javagamemaker.javagameengine.components

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.javagamemaker.javagameengine.components.Component
      • com.javagamemaker.javagameengine.components.Camera

  • public class Camera
extends Component
    Every scene has a camera and the camera is controlling the graphics The camera scale controls the zoom and its position controls the graphics position
